name: Blurring Blush Cream to Powder Lip and Cheek Stick
ingredients: -Avocado Oil: Helps Supports collagen synthesis..-African Yellow Wood Bark Extract: Nixes excess oil production while visibly smoothing out texture..-Blurring Microspheres: Give an airy, soft-focus blurred effect to the skin...Isononyl Isononanoate, Mica, Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Isoamyl Laurate, Paraffin, Synthetic Wax, Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Enantia Chlorantha Bark Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene, Silica, Decylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Lauroyl Lysine, Oleanolic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Aroma (Flavor). .May Contain (+/-): Ci 77891(Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 16035 (Red 40 Lake).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Get plush, velvet- skin finish by mixing with the Velvet Smooth Pore-Refining Primer (sold separately)  .-Layer Blurring Blush Stick with Kissed By The Sun Highlighter (sold separately) for a more intense blushed-from-within look. .-For a subtle, everyday sheen, mix with Rollaway Glow (sold separately) for skin that looks like itu2019s just had a facial. .-Wear Blurring Blush Stick on your lips for soft-focus, kissable color.
